body:
I just want to share my observation
Recently, before I joined the server avicus, I saw the words "downloading terrain" and it is still pops up until now whenever I join. This is happening more often
than before. And sometimes, it takes around a minute before I can get in the server.
Does this happen to you? Or is it only me?

title: I noticed this happening more often

replies.body: I can't even connect. Only to avicus though.
replies.body_tagged: I can't even connect. Only to avicus though.

replies.body: It happens. I usually just get impatient and quit, then reopen Minecraft.
replies.body_tagged: It happens. I usually just get impatient and quit, then reopen Minecraft.

replies.body: Happens to me all the time. I also get disconnected often, even though my internet keeps working. In fact I got disconnected 7 times in 30 min. Very frustrating, especially when I'm about to get an obby
replies.body_tagged: Happens to me all the time. I also get disconnected often, even though my internet keeps working. In fact I got disconnected 7 times in 30 min. Very frustrating, especially when I'm about to get an obby

replies.body: This happens to me quite often, but not that long that I have to restart minecraft. It's probably something on our side. Of course we're working on a fix.
replies.body_tagged: This happens to me quite often, but not that long that I have to restart minecraft. It's probably something on our side. Of course we're working on a fix.

replies.body: It's my ADHD that makes me restart Minecraft, but otherwise it takes a minute or so to load.
replies.body_tagged: It's my ADHD that makes me restart Minecraft, but otherwise it takes a minute or so to load.

replies.body: It doesnt take long to get on the server only a few seconds but i always get timed out and it take atleast 5 mins to re connect even when restarting the game. I time out like 4 times an hour
